SEARCH

Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.messages.requests

package it.polimi.ingsw.network.messages.requests
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    GenericRequestMessage
    Abstract class for messages used in network communication via sockets.
    SocketClientChoosePersonalObjectiveMessage
    Represents a request message sent by a client to choose a starting objective in a game.
    SocketClientChoosePlayerColorMessage
    Represents a message from a socket client to choose a player color in a game session.
    SocketClientCloseConnection
    Represents a request message sent by a client to close the connection.
    SocketClientCreateGameMessage
    Class representing a message from a client to create a new game in the network communication via sockets.
    SocketClientDrawCardMessage
    Represents a message from a client to request drawing a card in a game via socket network communication.
    SocketClientFetchAvailableGamesMessage
    Represents a message from a socket client requesting available games from the server.
    SocketClientFetchChatMessage
    Represents a message from a socket client requesting to fetch chat messages for a specific game.
    SocketClientFetchGameStateMessage
    Represents a message from a socket client requesting to fetch the current game state for a specific game.
    SocketClientFetchPersonalObjectiveMessage
    Represents a message from a socket client requesting to fetch the personal objective for a specific game.
    SocketClientGetAvailableColorsMessage
    Represents a message from a socket client requesting available colors for a game.
    SocketClientGetBackSideDecksMessage
    Represents a message from a client to request information about the back side of decks in a game via socket network communication.
    SocketClientGetCommonObjectivesMessage
    Represents a message from a client to request information about the common objectives in a game via socket network communication.
    SocketClientGetHandColorMessage
    Represents a message from a client to request information about a hand color in a game via socket network communication.
    SocketClientGetHandMessage
    Represents a message from a client to request information about a hand in a game via socket network communication.
    SocketClientGetHandTypeMessage
    Represents a message from a client to request information about the kind of cards in a player hand via socket network communication.
    SocketClientGetPlacingOrderMessage
    Represents a message from a socket client requesting the placing order information for a game.
    SocketClientGetPlayerBoard
    Represents a message from a client to request information about a player's board in a game via socket network communication.
    SocketClientGetPlayerColorMessage
    Represents a message from a socket client requesting the player color information for a game.
    SocketClientGetPlayerResourcesMessage
    Represents a message from a client to request information about a player's resources in a game via socket network communication.
    SocketClientGetPlayersMessage
    Represents a request message sent by a client to retrieve the list of players in a game.
    SocketClientGetScoreMapMessage
    Represents a message from a client to request information about the score map in a game via socket network communication.
    SocketClientGetStartingCardMessage
    Represents a request message sent by a client to retrieve the starting card in a game.
    SocketClientGetStartingObjectivesMessage
    Represents a message from a client to request information about the starting objectives in a game via socket network communication.
    SocketClientGetValidPlacementsMessage
    Represents a message from a client to request information about valid placements in a game via socket network communication.
    SocketClientGetVisibleCardsMessage
    Represents a message from a client to request information about visible cards in a game via socket network communication.
    SocketClientHeartbeatMessage
    Represents a heartbeat message sent from a socket client to indicate its presence and status.
    SocketClientJoinGameMessage
    Class representing a message from a client to join an existing game in network communication via sockets.
    SocketClientPlaceCardMessage
    Represents a message from a client to place a card in a game via socket network communication.
    SocketClientPlaceStartingCardMessage
    Represents a message sent by a socket client to place a starting card in a game.
    SocketClientPostChatMessage
    Represents a message sent by a socket client to post a chat message in a game.
    SocketClientWaitUpdateMessage
    Represents a message sent by a socket client to wait for game state updates.
    SocketValidateCredentialsMessage
    Represents a message from a client to validate a player's credentials via socket network communication.
